text: isklyuchaya tekh, kotoryye ili prisoyedinyayutsya k narodu, v kotorom vy v soyuze, ili kotoryye pridut k vam, tyagotyas' v svoikh serdtsakh voynoy s vami, ili voynoyu s narodom svoim. Yesli by Bog zakhotel, to sdelal by ikh sil'neye vas, i oni voyevali by s vami. Potom, yesli oni udalyatsya ot vas, ne vstupaya v voynu s vami, i zaklyuchivshi s vami mir, to Bog ne ustanovlyayet dlya vas pokhodov protiv nikh
